404.title: Seite nicht gefunden
404.subtext_html: Die Seite konnte nicht gefunden werden {{ link }}.

search.no_articles: Es wurden keine Produkte oder Seiten gefunden '{{ search_terms }}'.
search.no_products: Es wurden keine Produkte gefunden '{{ search_terms }}'.
search.no_results: Deine Suche nach '{{ search_terms }}' hat keine Ergebnisse.
search.results_text: Suche nach '{{ search_terms }}' hat folgende Ergebnisse: {{ results_count }} {{ results }}

social.title: Finde uns online
social.byline: Wir würden uns sehr freuen, wenn du uns empfehlen würdest!

article_item.comment_pending: Your comment has been submitted but needs to be approved by the store before posting.
article_item.comment_posted: Your comment bas been successfully posted! Refresh the page to see it.

general.currency_note_html: Notiz: Alle Bestellungen werden in {{ currency }} im aktuellen Wechselkurs abgerechnet.
general.empty: Du hast noch nichts in Deinem Warenkorb
general.stock_level: Entschuldigung, wir haben nur {{ stock_count }} auf Lager.

shipping_calculator.rates_html: There are {{ number_of_rates }} shipping rates available for {{ address }}, starting at {{ rate }}.
shipping_calculator.rate: There is one shipping rate available for {{ address }}.
shipping_calculator.no_rates: We do not ship to this destination.

general.success: Deine Nachricht wurde versendet. Wir melden uns zeitnah bei Dir.

orders.no_orders: You haven't placed any orders yet.

activate_account.benefits: Sign up for an account to take advantage of order history as well as pre-filled forms during checkout on subsequent orders.
activate_account.subtext: To activate your account, choose a password and enter it below.

addresses.no_address_html: You don't have any addresses saved to your account. Speed up your checkout process by adding a {{ new_address }}.

reset_password.error: There was an error resetting your password, please try again.
reset_password.new_password_for: Enter a new password for {{ email }}:
reset_password.subtext: We’ll send you an email to reset your password.
reset_password.successful_reset: We've sent you an email containing a password reset link. If you remember your password before you receive our email, feel free to log in below:

guest_login.no_login: Checkout as guest. No login required.

issued.title: Here's your {{ value }} gift card for {{ shop }}!
issued.redeem: Use this code at checkout to redeem your gift card

general.password_caption_html: Do you have a password? {{ trigger }}

product.success_html: ** product ** wurde Deinem Warenkorb {{ cart_link }} hinzugefügt. Hier geht es zur Kasse {{ checkout_link }}.

blog.title: Your post's title
blog.excerpt: Your store hasn’t published any blog posts yet. A blog can be used to talk about new product launches, tips, or other news you want to share with your customers. You can check out Shopify’s ecommerce blog for inspiration and advice for your own store and blog.

featured_product.title: Product title
featured_product.description: Tell customers about the look, feel, and style of your product. Add details on color, materials, sizing, and where it was made.

twitter.tweet: Connect your Twitter account to engage customers on and off your site!
